fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- There is no effect for landing on or passing by this space.
- Allows other Jail-related Cards and Spaces to exist.
- Jailed players cannot move unless they roll doubles.
- On the first or second turn of being jailed, a player may spend $50 prior to rolling the dice. If they do, they will leave Jail no matter what they roll.
- Jailed players are automatically released after the third turn of being jailed.
- Jailed players can still bid for, sell, mortgage, and trade properties. They can also collect rent from their opponents.
